errors.error_description: Changed Python version requirement to Python 2.7+ which is outdated and incompatible with modern libraries
Added specific version pinning (==0.1.0) to conda install command which may cause compatibility issues
correction_candidates: Remove version specification: conda install -c conda-forge skrub
Change to latest version: conda install -c conda-forge skrub>=2.0
Use version range: conda install -c conda-forge 'skrub>=0.1.0,<1.0'
Change to development version: conda install -c conda-forge skrub-dev
errors.golden_answer: Remove version specification: conda install -c conda-forge skrub
